getFileList

public static List<File> getFileList(String dirName,
                                     String prefix,
                                     String postfix)
                              throws Exception
Get a file list for dirName constrained by file prefix and postfix

Parameters:
dirName - The directory to list
prefix - The prefix for any file
postfix - The postfix for the file
Returns:
List the filtered list
Throws:
Exception - if the dirName doesn't exist or the file list throws an IO exception () See: File.listFiles()
